expected-result.ddl: create table category_prod \( category_id char\({1}\) not null, prod_id integer not null \); create table category \( id char\({1}\) not null, name char\({1}\) \); create table prod \( id integer not null, name char\({1}\) \);

alter table category_prod add constraint category_prod_categories foreign key \(category_id\) references category \(id\); alter table category_prod add constraint category_prod_products foreign key \(prod_id\) references prod \(id\);

create table category_prod \( category_id char\({1}\) not null, prod_id integer\({0}\) not null \); create table category \( id char\({1}\) not null, name char\({1}\) \); create table prod \( id integer\({0}\) not null, name char\({1}\) \);

alter table category_prod add constraint category_prod_categories foreign key category_prod_categories \(category_id\) references category \(id\) on delete cascade on update restrict; alter table category_prod add constraint category_prod_products foreign key category_prod_products \(prod_id\) references prod \(id\) on delete cascade on update restrict;
